20101228221802.000|20101228221804.000|TR0|financial crisis.  Both of those things

20101228222012.000|20101228222015.000|TR0|since the 1940s in this country -- Suzanne.
20101228222015.000|20101228222017.000|TR0|
20101228222017.000|20101228222019.000|TR0|MALVEAUX:  Poppy, that's pretty dire.  I 
20101228222019.000|20101228222022.000|TR0|mean, what are the options that these

20101228222942.000|20101228222944.000|TR0|the Obama administration has taken the use 
20101228222944.000|20101228222946.000|TR0|of unmanned drones to an almost 
20101228222946.000|20101228222949.000|TR0|unprecedented level.  By our count, so far

20101228222951.000|20101228222953.000|TR0|strikes in this tribal area of Afghanistan

20101228222956.000|20101228222958.000|TR0|lot of the Taliban leadership is hiding

20101228223017.000|20101228223019.000|TR0|U.S.'s part, and he said, that's really

20101228223035.000|20101228223038.000|TR0|technology to the Pakistanis always has to
